visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Dynamic Data'. The chart should have axes and labels styled with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include a single series named 'Random data' with initial data points [1, 5]. Custom colors should be used for the series. Additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.

subtitle.text: Click button to add point to chart

caption.text: A test case for dynamic data in charts.

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Dynamic Data' and a subtitle explaining the purpose of the chart. The axes and labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes for better readability. The chart includes a single data series named 'Random data' with initial data points [1, 5], and a custom color is applied to the series. Additional configurations include settings for chart margins, background color, and legend styling to enhance the overall appearance and accessibility of the chart.
